title: Actor Jaaved Jaaferi did not tweet this, here’s the fact check | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A screengrab of a tweet is being shared extensively on social media in which Bollywood actor Jaaved Jaaferi is defending the vegetable sellers who put saliva on the vegetables and fruits.

When NewsMobile team fact-checked the post, we found it to be fake.

Since the tweet was attributed to the actor, we checked all his social media accounts. A tweet dated April 17, 2020, cleared the air around this quote and said that it was fake. “ This screen shot of a tweet attributed to me is fake and insidious and made viral by the rampant scum. My tweets and speeches have always promoted communal harmony and in today’s trying time’s where the world unites to fight an enemy of humanity, #****off ” he tweeted on April 17, 2020. This screen shot of a tweet attributed to me is fake and insidious and made viral by the rampant #FakeNews scum. My tweets and speeches have always promoted communal harmony and in today’s trying time’s where the world unites to fight an enemy of humanity, #****off #HateMongers pic.twitter.com/Y7NIi00zmv

The above information proves that the image is morphed and the tweet in the viral post is not made by him.
